sentences.en: " And, discerning the scarlet letter on her breast, would scamper off with a strange, contagious fear. "
sentences.cn: 待 到看清她胸前的红字, 便怀着一种害怕受到传染的奇异的恐惧, 迅速逃开了.

sentences.en: Bundles of candles were procured, and straightway there was a general scamper up the hill.
sentences.cn: 一捆捆蜡烛拿了出来, 大家立即欢快地开始爬山.

sentences.en: Children scampered off the yellow school bus and into the playground.
sentences.cn: 孩子们跑下黄颜色的校车，奔跑进了操场。

sentences.en: Idea 1 : Mark begins screaming and the mice get scared and start to scamper around.
sentences.cn: 想法 一: 马克开始尖叫,这些老鼠受到惊吓后开始在房里乱窜.

sentences.en: Let the dog for a scamper.
Scamper before you get in deeper with this bunch.
sentences.cn: 趁早脱身吧,不然你要跟这伙坏人越缠越紧.

sentences.en: Scamper: Do not yell me! Igor: Please pull switch.
sentences.cn: 斯坎普: 不要冲我吼! 伊戈尔: 拜托请拉闸.

sentences.en: She loves to scamper through the woods of the forest.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢在森林里的树林中穿梭嬉戏.

trans.tran_en: to run with quick short steps, like a child or small animal

trans.tran_cn: 蹦蹦跳跳地跑，惊惶奔跑
trans.tran_en: When people or small animals scamper somewhere, they move there quickly with small, light steps
